item.title: Personal Objective Functions
item.description: My theory is that most people don’t know what to do with their life. To some extent - including me. Ever since I was 14, I’ve had to make a major life decision every ~2 years that would radically shape the way I perceive and interact with the world, but only the last two decisions have been made based on a mental model that I forced myself to sit down and stitch together based on my own set of values and beliefs.
